stories.text:
Today the .day domain released, and immediately all the "good" names were taken.

Any word that ends in -day and has a meaning, is already taken, probably with the intention of reselling them later for more.

Is this the future of the web? Is there no better way to work with domains?
stories.title: Ask HN: New TLD released, all good names taken
Texas sues Meta, saying it misused facial recognition data
Show HN: Exporting iCloud photos in 'per month' batches for backup and sorting

stories.text:
Hi guys! We just launched a thing that'll change your way you think about marketing. As marketing agencies veterans we didn't like the world where company owner instead of growing their business had to learn about marketing or educate themselves to even understand, what agency is going to offer. That's why we developed Digital First AI, an AI community-based recommendation platform, which is going to plan and execute marketing strategy adequate to your business characteristics. We're developing features such as: product market fit validation, marketing tactics recommendation based on AI, AI generated content. Our northern star goal is to create one-click marketing platform.
Right now we're doing presale - you can get 12 months (every update included) in the price of one so $99 (https://presale.digitalfirst.ai). It's worth to check is, especially that you can open your account for free (https://app.digitalfirst.ai/sign-up) without adding your credit card and we offer 3 months refund policy - no questions asked.
We are also looking for growth hackers to cooperate in terms of content monetization and affiliate program - if you're interested, just let me know. Btw, I'll be freaking grateful for every feedback you can give. THANKS!
stories.title: Launching Ultimate MarTech Tool / Special Presale Offer
